typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as string,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		cumulative_count as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ecdc/cases_deaths.csv']) ~> casesDeaths
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> countryLookup
casesDeaths filter(continent=="Europe") ~> filterEuropeData
filterEuropeData select(mapColumn(
		country_code,
		country,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		cumulative_count,
		source,
		each(match(type=="string"),
			$$+"_string" = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> selectRequiredColumns
selectRequiredColumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: true) ~> pivotEuropeData
pivotEuropeData, countryLookup lookup(pivotEuropeData@country == countryLookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
